description: This template deploys an Azure OpenAI resource with embeddings and GPT model deployments. It ensures private network access through a private endpoint and private DNS zone linked to a VNET, while also deploying a virtual machine for internal endpoint connectivity testing and a secure Bastion host for remote access.
summary: Azure OpenAI with embeddings and GPT models, private network access, a VM for endpoint testing, and a Bastion host for remote access
